title: 97/665/EC: Commission Decision of 29 September 1997 amending Decision 97/85/EC recognizing that the production of certain quality wines produced in specified regions in Spain, by reason of their qualitative characteristics, is far from able to satisfy demand (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 September 1997 amending Decision 97/85/EC recognizing that the production of certain quality wines produced in specified regions in Spain, by reason of their qualitative characteristics, is far from able to satisfy demand (Only the Spanish text is authentic) (97/665/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 97/85/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 September 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
